titleStmt.title: A hopefull way to cure, that horrid sinne of swearing: or an helpe to save swearers, if willing to be saved being an offer or message from him whom they so daringly and audaciously provoke. Also a curb against cursing.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

notesStmt.note: MH copy cropped and stained with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
